lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First up, our friends since the beginning of this campaign, D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM

Both streams will raise money for Extra Life, a charity that unites thousands of gamers in support of local children's hospitals across North America.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If shit looks real bad, real fast, we're out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the thing you always say, pop pop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, are you worried about the time and missing Traveler Con? You've been waiting years, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I only knew about it recently, so no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you don't want to miss it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd have to be in here a long time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm confident we can handle anything, as long as we're together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We go to Traveler Con, and we come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do, what do we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing? Are you having a look? Are you turning the other way? Are you going through or staying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is how this group makes decisions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll take a peek and then we'll go backward to one unknown room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all going to hold hands, we're going to buddy system.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to peek and pop right back out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want to point out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're doing elementary hand holding chain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, because shit gets sucked into the astral sea and is never seen again!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're walking through that magic door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a feeling the minute we go through he's going to go, "I let go of everyone's hands." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step through, you drift forward, the purple--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The purple door comes your way, and as it passes by, you all find yourself not touching the ground, but just drifting there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're perpetually falling for the rest of our lives.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can take a long rest, set some new spells while we're falling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like maybe destroying that heart possibly made stuff easier up ahead, or made stuff angrier, I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come through, you find yourself just stationary, drifting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door behind you is built into a massive, rough island of dull cerulean rock that sits adrift in this strange place, but what really catches your eye are the numerous platinum chains, maybe a dozen or so, thick platinum chains that are bolted tightly to and wrapped around this dark blue rock before pulling to the creature that they restrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just below the door, about 30 or so feet from the island, and about 25 or so feet from you, rests a terrifying behemoth that challenges the darkest of your nightmares.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spin around and look, and you see two large levers framing each side of the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any other structures, or is it just infinity around all this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will assist you in that perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some shelves, maybe? He needs to inspect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Just those two levers, and the rocky island there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm on the end of the human chain, Should I try some NASA astronaut-like propulsion to send us back towards the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to will yourself that direction, you float that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) So Caleb and Beauregard in the space can travel quicker than anybody, and Caduceus is holding up the caboose. The cabuceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, is this that serpent creature that we saw in those drawings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You can make an arcana check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It really is an astral dreadnought?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like it is dormant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it has, like, 600 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only things you notice are the numerous chains that bind it to this island, and then the chains seem to cluster around two of these levers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know you go to the zoo and you want to see the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it taut, tight, the way it's held? Or is it just like loosey-goosey?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's a couple that are pretty loose, but most of them are pretty taut, and some of the-- it's bound in different directions to where it's held suspended.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you say, we let it go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we go though the door, I can just shoot at the chains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are between this giant rock island and you floated out of the doorway that's on this island where the two levers are, and all the chains are coming around you and bound around this creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really want to pull one of those levers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to leave a dick in here or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make an investigation check to see what the levers do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to roll an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both have no idea what these levers do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I think you pull them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've seen it, right? We've seen it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to ascertain looking at the levers and the chains?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a ship, it's not a plane--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there's actually within this island, what initially you didn't notice, intricate little bits of clockwork that weave behind and the lever on the left, if pulled, would probably release all of the chains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather, if they were pulled, it might force the jaw open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so he can feed things to the dreadnought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he keeps it alive or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or it breathes some sort of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If all of these experiments that you, bonus, you generate-

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He said the bodies were jettisoned into the astral sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the last bit of the notes that you read, regarding this, dealt with one of his ritual chambers within the dreadnought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can pull it open and go inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go in? Just to see, just to see what it's like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll open its mouth and go inside of it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's probably where the portal is to the crystal mines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check if you want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, do you want to go in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never knew we could go inside of a big--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? As you look towards the dreadnought and look around back at the island, there was actually another door, about 30 or so feet below, the one that you're at, that is closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the way to the crystal mines.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to-- that'll actually save us some time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said sacrifice chamber inside the dreadnought?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to go in the astral dreadnought?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would we go inside the dreadnought?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, with the keen mind, was it that the jar was within here? I'm trying to remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed to be his experimentation with this magic jar, a part of his soul transference, that that particular part of his research ended him heading towards the ritual chamber within the dreadnought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, you want to go inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe going from inside the dreadnought would take us to the circle bound chamber?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe we end up in his butthole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it seems like he has a bachelor pad inside this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were not even going to come in here to begin with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, hands for going in the giant astral dreadnought.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is floating between my hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should open the mouth, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, while I send Frumpkin up and just float him right in front of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will ourselves right near that fucking door, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys all drift by the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will you hold onto me, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blind and deaf and Frumpkin is just floating in the astral sea in front of this thing's closed mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys remember which one is the lever to let go and which one opens the mouth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The one on the right is the one--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like being blind and deaf, so please do something soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull the lever, and you hear (whirring), and you just beyond, out of the sight of the top of the island, something sparks, and the sparks send down to the two chains, and then arc over to the side of the creature's mouth, shocking the sides of its body-- sides of its head. You watch it pull and restrain against the chains, and as it does, the jaw (sighs) opens up, the teeth lining it, bit of spittle spattering out, and as it's open, you just see the dark interior of its throat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Send that fucking cosmonaut into that goddamn dreadnought.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just starts paddling through the astral plane inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin heads into the gargantuan maw of this terrifying astral beast, you see the cat disappear into the shadow and then you lose contact with Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) It is, it's another doorway, holy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing has another plane inside of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if it does go to the circle chamber, that actually shaves off a lot of time, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we don't know where it goes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not innards. It's not the inside of a beast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to go in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now I'm flipping, now I'm flipping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Counterclockwise, Caduceus, going in or leaving?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Going in! Sam, speak the truth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, I'm holding onto him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's three and one, that's three and one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you watch as the entirety your friend party, one by one, drift into the open gaping toothy jaws of an astral dreadnought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until they're all disappeared into the shadow--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding Nott's hand? You're going with them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rule before we came in here was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Nott, you're being dragged into its mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just at that moment that you look behind and you can see the silhouetted shadow of the dozens of teeth and the jaw closes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel your body suddenly get drawn (whooshes) quickly down a space similar to stepping through these doorways before--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is too open with what little bit of light you have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look down, what's on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stone. Your gravity has taken you now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking my hands back. We're standing with fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see distant sconces of burning torches and candelabras set in the center.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sick, I'm sick. My arm hurts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm into it. I'm really into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one thing you do note.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no doorway behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just this open space with a little bit of firelight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll see where this goes next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know where this goes?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know what's in this chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I thought you guys were going to go the other way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course you should've gone the other way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do we keep doing this!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
